H0.text: Who is the vice President of the,USA. Kamala Harris

H1.text: Who is the vice President of the,USA. Mike Pence

H2.text: Who is the vice President of the,USA. Nancy Pelosi

H3.text: Who is the vice President of the,USA. Biden

A4.text: Kamala Harris was sworn in as vice president at 11:40 a.m. on January 20, 2021, by Justice Sonia Sotomayor.

A5.text: Harris left office on January 20, 2025, and was succeeded by the 50th vice president of the United States, JD Vance.
